description: An icy and delicate dessert packed with sharp ingredients.
name: Granita with Passionfruit & Lemon Curd Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lime, keep the juice and grate the zest into strings
150g passion fruit, just flesh and seeds

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the lime zest strings with the caster sugar and 1 tsp of lime juice, combine fully and set to one side.
In a blender, combine the strawberries with the passionfruit, the rest of the lime juice, brown sugar and lemon curd.
Blend until mixed well and transfer to a freezer suitable container.
Freeze for 4 hours but every 30 minutes, take out and mix it up using a fork.
When its ready to serve, divide into serving bowls, top with whipped cream and garnish with sugared zest strings.
